title: The Vampire Contessa: From The Journal of Jeremy Quentain
description: A Romantic Times Award-winning Author In the classic tradition of the Gothic romance, Marilyn Ross has woven a spine-tingling story of innocence and evil. Set in the London of the 1880s, it moves from the elegant townhouse of the young Fosters to the opium dens of the underworld to the coffins of the living dead of the "otherworld." Through it all moves Jeremy Quentain, the handsome recluse dedicated to finding justice for friends outside the law.  Available only in Romance 12.
author: Marilyn Ross
